scene_description_enriched: The upper register depicts the martyrdom of Saint Agatha. A haloed woman, Saint Agatha, stands with her breasts exposed and bleeding, pierced by two metal instruments held by two tormentors. The tormentors, dressed in blue and pink tunics with pink and green hose respectively, are actively inflicting pain. Behind them, a landscape with trees is visible through an arched opening framed by a column. The lower register shows a woman, likely Saint Agatha in contemplation or prayer, with a halo, reading a book. She is depicted within an architectural setting of arches and columns.
